server.widgets.dao
Class WidgetDao

java.lang.Object
  server.widgets.dao.WidgetDao

public class WidgetDao
extends java.lang.Object

This is the class to access database of widgets. The operations contain: create a widget, find a widget by name, list widgets in a service, update a widget.

Version:
1.0 February 24, 2013.
Author:
Steven Zhang
